alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:25AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Morgan County through 830 AM CDT... At 725 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Otterville, or 12 miles west of Tipton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Versailles, Stover, Barnett, Syracuse and Florence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
